data.description: Explore the ethical dilemmas faced by researchers across biomedical and nonbiomedical research and consider how to best support scientific integrity and public trust. Fulfill NIH training requirements for the responsible conduct of research. Identify the regulatory guidelines and ethical frameworks and principles guiding research ethics and responsible research conduct. Develop the skills to make ethically informed decisions in relation to their research and training.
data.title: ADVANCED RESEARCH ETHICS & RESPONSIBLE CONDUCT OF RESEARCH
